resources.string: Tap reset to clear all of the test result?
Use this software is subject to terms and conditions on ASUS.
ASUS Nexus 7 VIP support Phone Number
Please fill the blanks and send the repair request.
Leave some message to describe your request
Description about the test item.Description about the test item.Description about the test item.Description about the test item.
If not charging, please tap fail.
Please move your phone close to a light.
If not NFC card found, please tap the fail button.
Please move your hand over the top half of your of phone.
Please check whether the camera flash light on or not and make a judge.
Please check whether the camera front flash light on or not and make a judge.
Please move your hand over the top half of your phone.
Please move your hand away from the top half of your phone.
If no NFC card found, please tap the fail button.
If no charging, please tap the fail.
Please move your phone close to a light
Please move your phone away from light and cover the top half of it using a hand
%s test finished. Please make a judgement!
Please plug in the headset and continue to test again
Please remove the headset and continue to test again
You have not finished all of the test items.Do you want to continue to finish it?
please plug SIM card in the device and continue to test again.
please open cellular network and try again.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Battery_Test
string-array.item: The "Battery Test" is used to test the battery status.
(This test procedure will automatically start without any manual operation.)

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_BoardMic_Test
string-array.item: The "Board Mic Test" is used to test the board mic function.
Test procedure:
1. Tap [Start] to start recording.
2. After getting the recording results and if the mic function of the headset is working well, press [PASS], else press [FAIL] to terminate this test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_BoardMic2_Test
string-array.item: The "Board Mic2 Test" is used to test the upper board mic function.
Test procedure:
1. Tap [Start] to start recording.
2. After getting the recording results and if the mic function of the headset is working well, press [PASS], else press [FAIL] to terminate this test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_BoardMic3_Test
string-array.item: The "Board Mic3 Test" is used to test the upper board mic function.
Test procedure:
1. Tap [Start] to start recording.
2. Check the recording results; if the mic function of the headset is working well, tap [PASS], or else tap [FAIL] to terminate this test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_BT_Test
string-array.item: The "Bluetooth Test" allows you to test the Bluetooth function. This test procedure will start automatically without any manual operations.
Note: This requires another working Bluetooth device for testing.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Barometer_Test
string-array.item: The Barometer Test is used to test the barometer function.
Test Procedure:
Tap [Start] to start test.This test procedure will be started automatically without any manual

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_CameraFlash_Test
string-array.item: The "Camera Flash Test" is used to test the camera flash.
Test procedure:
1. To start testing, the device opens the camera flash automatically.
"2. Tap the number that corresponds to the number of flashes. Tap [FAIL] if it's not working."

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_CameraFlash_Front_Test
string-array.item: The "Front Camera Flash Test" is used to test the front camera flash.
Test procedure:
1. When the testing starts, the device automatically opens the flash.
"2. Tap the number that corresponds to the number of flashes. Tap [FAIL] if it's not working."

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_CMD_Mouse_Test
string-array.item: The "Mouse Test" is used to test the mouse function.
Test procedure:
1. Connect the mouse to your device via OTG.
2. This test procedure will automatically start without any manual operation.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_OTG_Mouse_Test
string-array.item: The "Mouse Test" is used to test the mouse function.
Test procedure:
1. Connect the mouse to your device via OTG.
2. This test procedure will automatically detect the mouse at its first time. Move the mouse when you see "No OTG mouse found".

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Display_Test
string-array.item: The "Display Test" is used to test the RGB color model and brightness of the LCD.
Test procedure:
1. Tap the screen to change the background.
2. If the display works well, press [PASS], else press [FAIL] to terminate this test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_ECompass_Test
string-array.item: The "ECompass Test" is used to test the ECompass sensor.
(This test procedure will automatically start without any manual operation.)

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_FingerPrint_Test
string-array.item: The "Fingerprint Test" is used to test the fingerprint function.
(This test procedure will automatically start without any manual operation.)

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_GPS_Test
string-array.item: The "GPS Test" is used to test the GPS feature.
(This test procedure will automatically start without any manual operation.)

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_GSensor_Test
string-array.item: The "GSensor Test" is used to test the gravity sensor.
Test procedure:
1. Tilt the device in portrait, landscape, or slant modes.
2. If the device detects the gravity, the screen shows the marks on the X, Y, and Z axis.
3. If the marks on the three axis appear, this test will finish automatically, else press [FAIL], to terminate this test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Gyroscope_Test
string-array.item: The "Gyroscope Test" is used to test the Gyroscope sensor.
(This test procedure will automatically start without any manual operation.)

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_HDMI_Test
string-array.item: The "HDMI Test" is used to test the audio and video transfer to an HDMI display.
Test procedure:
1. Connect your device to an external HDMI display via USB port.
2. Tap [Start] to broadcast the video.
3. If the HDMI function works, press [PASS], else press [FAIL] to terminate this test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Headset_Test
string-array.item: The "Headset Test" is used to test the left and right channels of the headset.
Test procedure:
1. Connect a headset to the device.
2. Tap [Start].
3. If the headset function works, press [PASS], else press [FAIL] to terminate this test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Headset_L_Test
string-array.item: "The \"Headset Left Channel Test\" is used to check if the headset's left channel is working."
Test Procedure:
1. Connect the headset to the headset port of the device.
2. Tap [Start].
"3. If the headset's left channel functions well, tap [PASS]. If not, tap [FAIL] to terminate the procedure."

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Headset_R_Test
string-array.item: "The \"Headset Right Channel Test\" is used to check if the headset's right channel is working."
Test Procedure:
1. Connect the headset to the headset port of the device.
2. Tap [Start].
"3. If the headset's right channel functions well, tap [PASS]. If not, tap [FAIL] to stop the test."

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_DigitalTV_Test
string-array.item: The digital TV test is used to check the digital TV functionality. Please ensure that the digital signal in your location is available before testing.
Test Procedure:
1. Plug the headset (which serves as your antenna) to the headset port of your device.
2. Select a digital channel to watch in a DigitalTV app.
3. Tap the Back key to leave DigitalTV. If the function works well, tap [PASS]. If not, tap [FAIL] to stop the test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_HeadsetKey_Test
string-array.item: The "Headset Main Key Test" is used to test the key on headset.
Test procedure:
1. Connect a headset to the device.
2. Press the key on the headset.
"3. If the function of the headset's key works, this test will finish automatically, else press [FAIL] to terminate this test."

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_HeadsetMic_Test
string-array.item: The "Headset Mic Test" is used to test the mic feature of the headset.
Test procedure:
1. Connect a headset to the device.
2. Tap [Start] to start recording.
3. After getting the recording results and if the mic function of the headset is working well, press [PASS], else press [FAIL] to terminate this test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Keyboard_Test
string-array.item: The "Keyboard Test" is used to test the Keyboard function.
Test procedure:
1. Select a local keyboard.
2. Press all displayed keys in any sequence.
3. If the keyboard works, this test will finish automatically, else press [FAIL] to terminate this test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Keypad_Test
string-array.item: The "Keypad Test" is used to test the Keypad function.
Test procedure:
1. According to the step, press the specific button/key.
2. If the keypad works, this test will finish automatically, else press [FAIL] to terminate this test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_LightSensor_Test
string-array.item: The "Light Sensor Test" is used to test the light sensor.
Test procedure:
1. Place the device to a well-lit environment, then move it to a poor-lit surrounding to determine the function of the ambient light sensor.
2. If the light sensor works, this test will finish automatically, else press [FAIL] to terminate this test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_MainCamCapture_Test
string-array.item: The "Main Camera Capture Test" is used to test the main camera of the device.
Test procedure:
1. Press [SHUTTER] to capture photo.
2. If the photo is captured, press [PASS], else press [FAIL] to terminate this test.
Note: This test is to try the camera by opening, taking a picture, and show the photo. This test does not include performance and clarity.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_WideCamCapture_Test
string-array.item: The Wide-angled Camera Capture Test is used to test if the main camera is working
Test Procedure:
1. Tap Capture to snap a photo.
2. If the photo is captured successfully, tap [PASS]. If not, tap [FAIL] to stop the test.
Note: This test is only for basic functions such as launching camera, capturing a photo, and showing the result. This test is not meant for measuring performance and clarity.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_TeleCamCapture_Test
string-array.item: The Tele Camera Capture Test is used to check if the main camera in the device is working.
Test Procedure:
1. Tap Capture to snap a photo.
2. If the photo is captured successfully, tap [PASS]. If not, tap [FAIL] to stop the test.
Note: This test is only for basic functions such as launching camera, capturing a photo, and showing the result. This test is not meant for measuring performance and clarity.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_FrontWideCamCapture_Test
string-array.item: The Front Wide-angle Camera Capture Test allows you to test the main camera.
To test the front wide camera:
1. Tap [Capture].
2. If the photo is captured, tap [PASS]. If not, tap [FAIL].
Note: This test in only for basic camera functions such as launching camera, capturing a photo, and displaying the photo. This test is not meant to measure the performance and clarity.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_FrontTeleCamCapture_Test
string-array.item: The Front Tele Camera Capture Test allows you to test the main camera.
To test the front tele camera:
1. Tap [Capture].
2. If the photo is captured, tap [PASS]. If not, tap [FAIL].
Note: This test in only for basic camera functions such as launching camera, capturing a photo, and displaying the photo. This test is not meant to measure the performance and clarity.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_ModemBus_Test
string-array.item: The "Modem Test" is used to test the modem function of the device.
(This test procedure will automatically start without any manual operation.)

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_MultiTouch_Test
string-array.item: The "Multiple Touch Test" is used to test the multiple touch function on the panel.
Test procedure:
1. Put your fingers on the screen.
2. If the multitouch function works, this test will finish automatically, else press [FAIL] to terminate this test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_NFC_TagReader_Test
string-array.item: The "NFC Tag Reader Test" is used to test the NFC sensor.
Test procedure:
1. Ensure that the NFC feature is ON.
2. Place an NFC-tagged object near the device.
3. If the NFC tag reader works, this test will finish automatically, else press [FAIL] to terminate this test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_PhoneCall_Test
string-array.item: "The \"Phone Call Test\" allows you to test the phone call functionality."
To test a phone call:
1. Enter the phone number, then tap [Call].
2. Tap Back key to return to the test result screen. If the call is successful, tap [PASS]. If not, tap [FAIL].
Notes:
1. This test is designed to test the call function, NOT the quality of the call.
2. SIM2 is necessary if the device supports dual SIM card functionality.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Proximity_Test
string-array.item: The "Proximity Test" is used to test the proximity sensor function.
Test procedure:
1. Place your hand near the proximity sensor of the device, then move your hand away to complete the proximity detection.
2. If the proximity function works, this test will finish automatically, else press [FAIL] to terminate this test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Receiver1_Test
string-array.item: The "Receiver Test" is used to test the receiver function.
Test procedure:
1. The receiver of the device will emit a voice prompt.
"2. Follow the voice prompt by tapping the correct number. Tap [FAIL] if it's not working."

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Receiver2_Test
string-array.item: The "Receiver Test" is used to test the receiver function.
Test procedure:
1. The receiver of the device will make a sound.
"2. Follow the voice prompt by tapping the correct number. Tap [FAIL] if it's not working."

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_SDcard_Test
string-array.item: The "SD Card Test" is used to test the SD card reader function.
Test procedure:
1. Insert a microSD card to the microSD card slot of the device.
2. This test procedure will automatically start without any manual operation.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_SIMcard_Test
string-array.item: The "SIM Card Test" is used to test the SIM card on the SIM card slot of the device.
Test procedure:
1. Insert the SIM card in SIM card slot of the device.
2. This test procedure will automatically start without any manual operation.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_SIMcard_Test2
string-array.item: The "SIM Card2 Test" is used to test the second SIM card on the SIM card slot 2 of the device.
Test procedure:
1. Insert the SIM card in SIM card slot 2 of the device.
2. This test procedure will automatically start without any manual operation.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_SIM_Signal_Test
string-array.item: "The \"SIM Signal Test\" allows you to test the SIM signal strength."
1. Insert the SIM card into the SIM card slot of the device.
2. Tap [Start] to start testing.
"If the item \"Network\" shows the mobile service provider, and Cellular network status shows \"Connected\", tap [PASS]. Otherwise, tap [FAIL] to stop the test."
Notes:
1. You must test both SIM card slots.
2. Move the SIM card to the other slot or install another SIM card if using a dual-SIM device.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Speaker_Test
string-array.item: The "Speaker Test" is used to test the speaker function of this device.
Test procedure:
1. Tap [Start] to listen to the sound.
2. If the speaker function works, tap [PASS]. If not, tap [FAIL] to stop the test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Touch_Test
string-array.item: The "Touch Test" is used to test the sensitivity of the touch screen by finger pressure.
Test procedure:
1. Using your finger, draw a straight line across the length of each one of the six gray areas. The line should only occupy the gray area and should span its entire length.
2. The gray area turns green when the test is successful. If not, it turns red.
3. Repeat this procedure if the gray area turns red. If, after several attempts, it still turns red, tap [FAIL] to stop the test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_VGACamCapture_Test
string-array.item: The "Front Camera Capture Test" is used to test the front camera capture function.
Test procedure:
1. Press [SHUTTER] to capture photo.
2. If the photo is captured successfully, tap [PASS]. If not, tap [FAIL] to stop the test.
"Note: This test doesn't measure your camera's performance nor fix clarity issues."

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Vibrator_Test
string-array.item: The "Vibration Test" is used to test the vibration function.
Test procedure:
1. Tap [Start].
"Tap the number that corresponds to the number of vibrations. Tap [FAIL] if it's not working."

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_WiFiBus_Test
string-array.item: "The \"Wi-Fi Test\" allows you to test the Wi-Fi function of this device. This test procedure will start automatically without any manual operations."
Note: A working Wi-Fi hotspot should be present during testing.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_Wireless_Charger_Test
string-array.item: The "Wireless Charger Test" is used to test the wireless charging function of this device.
Test procedure:
1.Put your device on a powered-on wireless charger.
2. If the wireless charging works, this test will automatically finish. If not, tap [FAIL] to stop the test.

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_USBCharger_Test
string-array.item: "The \"USB Charging Test\" allows you to test the USB charging function of this device."
To test the USB charging function:
1. Connect your device to a USB charger.
"2. If the device indicates that it's charging, it passed the test. Unplug the charger to continue. If not, tap [FAIL] to stop the test."

string-array.name: TestItem_Des_AC_Charger_Test
string-array.item: "The \"AC Charging Test\" allows you to test the AC charging function of this device."
To test the AC charging function:
1. Connect your device to an AC charger.
"2. If the device indicates that it's charging, it passed the test. Unplug the charger to continue. If not, tap [FAIL] to stop the test."
